name: Mind's Garden
description:
Description:

Mind's Garden is a 3D audio visualizer which players can explore and interact with. The current demo showcases procedurally generated terrain and plants which react to the music being played. Each of the four orbs scattered throughout the map play a unique track from a song, and only by finding them all and bringing them back to the central pond can the full song be heard.

Although the current demo doesn't allow for unique audio to be uploaded, future versions will use Spleeter (https://github.com/deezer/spleeter)  to incorporate any audio file the user wishes to hear.

Current Song in Build: In Cold Blood (Bauer Remix) by Alt-J

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move player
  • Space -> Jump
  • Shift -> Sprint
  • Mouse -> Look around
  • Left Click -> Claim music orb

Process Blog: https://github.com/cyuun/mind-garden
